name: BlackSeraphimon
description: BlackSeraphimon is a Seraphimon whose armor is black, with gold and dark green accents. Its helmet is dark green, and its ten wings are dark red. The DigiCode on its breechcloth read すべてわれとと ( 全て/我とと , Subete / ware to to ? ) , which are fragments of similar DigiCode on Seraphimon that reads in full すべてはわれとともに ( 全ては我と共に , Subete wa ware to tomoni ? , lit. "All with me") .
